title: Loving Juniper
description: Everything comes full circle in a strange sort of synergy for Kyle Paxton, as the lost love he has been trying to find for over two years in finally in front of him. After a year of living her dream job as a Celtic curator in London and Ireland, Juniper finds herself back home, in front of the man her head has been telling her to forget but her heart won’t allow her to. Join Juniper and Kyle in this extended epilogue to their epic love story that began in Ann Arbor with Juniper Smoke and concludes with Loving Juniper in San Francisco. After hundreds of days apart, over thousands of miles, will this be their final love note? Will Juniper and Kyle finally find a happily-ever-after at their journey’s end?
author: Sadia Ash
